name: Gärn Clicker
description:
Click click click..

click, upgrade, get achivements, ascend, and then do it all again.

i did not take this game seriously

THIS GAME DOES NOT SAVE.

I dont know if this works on mac, or linux, and i cant test it. but unity says the build is for it so it might work.

keyboard shortcuts:

A - Ascend

E - Shop

Esc - Main menu
